name: part_011
file: tmp_≪3D SHOWCASE≫ ƎNOZ N∩Ⅎ ƎH⊥ O⊥ ƎWOϽ˥ƎM #RatIdol3D [Qd5HBpoOIJA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Chiki Chiki Ban Ban'.
Instrumental outro and transition to MC segment.
MC section after the performance. Hakos Baelz introduces new merchandise and announces an upcoming Council 3D collab stream.
The audience (Bears) chants for an encore.

subtitles.original: ...行く　明けなきゃ伝説 yeah
subtitles.english: ...go, if it never ends it's a legend, yeah

subtitles.original: Bam step, bam step, jump! 夢まき散らそう
subtitles.english: Bam step, bam step, jump! Let's scatter dreams

subtitles.original: 夢まき散らそう
subtitles.english: Let's scatter dreams

subtitles.original: 熱く dancing all yeah
subtitles.english: Hot dancing all, yeah

subtitles.original:
太古の理想さ臆病蹴散らして
成り行き任せさ　ボン・ジョヴィなら
subtitles.english:
An ancient ideal, kicking away cowardice
Leave it to fate, if it's Bon Jovi

subtitles.original:
空は空は　空を飛ぶ絨毯
まさかさましても　向かないで
subtitles.english:
The sky is, the sky is, a flying carpet
Even if it's upside down, don't look back

subtitles.original:
イン気じゃダメ　韻踏むしたまい
誰々する前に　エンディング人生
subtitles.english:
Being gloomy is no good, go and rhyme
Before you're whoever, life's ending

subtitles.original:
見栄えのシャイニング輝度
はにか気にせず音量戦...
subtitles.english:
A good-looking shining brightness
Without worrying about shyness, volume war...

subtitles.original: Oh baby, 降参不信ね　ハハハイセツキラー
subtitles.english: Oh baby, a lack of surrender, ha ha high-sense killer

subtitles.original:
舞い高く舞い散りゃいいでしょ
燃え盛っちゃってもいいでしょ
subtitles.english:
It's fine to dance high and scatter
It's fine to even flare up

subtitles.original:
もう少しブレーキ　もう少し倍にゃ
暑くなるから危険は承知
subtitles.english:
Brake a little more, double it a little more
Knowing the danger as it gets hotter

subtitles.original:
ほらほら近い　スポットライトあてな
待ちわびた時だ　8時間!
subtitles.english:
Look, look, it's close, shine the spotlight
It's the long-awaited time, 8 hours!

subtitles.original: Ai chiki chiki!
subtitles.english: Ai chiki chiki!

subtitles.original: Ha!
subtitles.english: Ha!

subtitles.original: Thank you everyone!
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: That was Chiki Chiki Ban Ban!
subtitles.english: That was Chiki Chiki Ban Ban!

subtitles.original: I'm so glad that I was able to dance the dance
subtitles.english: I'm so glad that I was able to dance the dance

subtitles.original: as well as sing the song.
subtitles.english: as well as sing the song.

subtitles.original: I'm just so happy! Thank you!
subtitles.english: I'm just so happy! Thank you!

subtitles.original: Anyway, thank you so much for listening
subtitles.english: Anyway, thank you so much for listening

subtitles.original: to my third and... final song.
subtitles.english: to my third and... final song.

subtitles.original: 最後のお曲、あの、聞いてくれてありがとうございました!
subtitles.english: Thank you for listening to my final song!

subtitles.original: Anyway, yes, that was totally my final song.
subtitles.english: Anyway, yes, that was totally my final song.

subtitles.original: But thank you so much for watching everyone!
subtitles.english: But thank you so much for watching everyone!

subtitles.original: It is time for the announcement time!
subtitles.english: It is time for the announcement time!

subtitles.original: But to help me do this announcement,
subtitles.english: But to help me do this announcement,

subtitles.original: I need a very special helper.
subtitles.english: I need a very special helper.

subtitles.original: Hi! Helper please! I need help!
subtitles.english: Hi! Helper please! I need help!

subtitles.original: Squeakers, お疲れ様。お疲れ様です。
subtitles.english: Squeakers, good job. Good job.

subtitles.original: You're doing great. Boy Squeakers, you're doing great.
subtitles.english: You're doing great. Boy Squeakers, you're doing great.

subtitles.original: Thank you, Squeakers!
subtitles.english: Thank you, Squeakers!

subtitles.original: I present to you the Street Rat T-shirt!
subtitles.english: I present to you the Street Rat T-shirt!

subtitles.original: Yes, this is my official 3D stream merch.
subtitles.english: Yes, this is my official 3D stream merch.

subtitles.original: And yes, I have very little time to show this,
subtitles.english: And yes, I have very little time to show this,

subtitles.original: so we're on the clock, okay?
subtitles.english: so we're on the clock, okay?

subtitles.original: Street Rat T-Shirt
subtitles.english: Street Rat T-Shirt

subtitles.original: Okay, how fast can I do this? Shiotaru, here we go!
subtitles.english: Okay, how fast can I do this? Shiotaru, here we go!

subtitles.original: There are six key features of this t-shirt.
subtitles.english: There are six key features of this t-shirt.

subtitles.original: Six! Okay, let me sell it to you.
subtitles.english: Six! Okay, let me sell it to you.

subtitles.original: Number one, the logo on the front matches the one on the back.
subtitles.english: Number one, the logo on the front matches the one on the back.

subtitles.original: Number two, there are stripes on the sleeves to make it really cool.
subtitles.english: Number two, there are stripes on the sleeves to make it really cool.

subtitles.original: Number three, there are slits along the side to make it breathable and airable.
subtitles.english: Number three, there are slits along the side to make it breathable and airable.

subtitles.original:
Number four, there are little distress details on the collar
because I got hungry and I decided to nibble a little bit.
subtitles.english:
Number four, there are little distress details on the collar
because I got hungry and I decided to nibble a little bit.

subtitles.original: Number five, there's a classic rat logo inside for you.
subtitles.english: Number five, there's a classic rat logo inside for you.

subtitles.original: Number six, I designed this myself.
subtitles.english: Number six, I designed this myself.

subtitles.original: And yeah, oh, seven actually, there's a really cool design.
subtitles.english: And yeah, oh, seven actually, there's a really cool design.

subtitles.original: まあ、一応、日本語も少し。あの、まあ、グッズの紹介したと思います。
subtitles.english: Well, for now, a little Japanese. Um, I think I've introduced the merch.

subtitles.original: とてもかっこいいです。ぜひ買ってください。
subtitles.english: It's very cool. Please buy it.

subtitles.original: Please! Please buy it! It looks so cool! かっこいいでしょ？
subtitles.english: Please! Please buy it! It looks so cool! It's cool, right?

subtitles.original: 그리고... 아... 한국어도 할게요. 아... 사주세요.
subtitles.english: And... ah... I'll speak Korean too. Ah... please buy it.

subtitles.original: 멋있어요. 사주세요.
subtitles.english: It's cool. Please buy it.

subtitles.original: And the second announcement is that on October 9th, Council will be having their...
subtitles.english: And the second announcement is that on October 9th, Council will be having their...

subtitles.original: who's their? Our! 3D collab stream!
subtitles.english: who's their? Our! 3D collab stream!

subtitles.original: There'll be a lot of singing, games, and it's gonna be a lot of fun,
subtitles.english: There'll be a lot of singing, games, and it's gonna be a lot of fun,

subtitles.original: so I hope you guys come and watch that as well!
subtitles.english: so I hope you guys come and watch that as well!

subtitles.original: Well, I don't know guys, I feel like that's it.
subtitles.english: Well, I don't know guys, I feel like that's it.

subtitles.original: これで終了？終わり？
subtitles.english: Is that it? Is it over?

subtitles.original: Is that it? I wonder... I don't know, they're telling me to go off stage.
subtitles.english: Is that it? I wonder... I don't know, they're telling me to go off stage.

subtitles.original: Oh, we're going. That's it. We're gonna go now. Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Oh, we're going. That's it. We're gonna go now. Bye bye!

subtitles.original: I had so much fun! I had so much fun!
subtitles.english: I had so much fun! I had so much fun!

subtitles.original: I'll see you in the next show. I'll see you later. Okay, I'm coming! Bye bye!
subtitles.english: I'll see you in the next show. I'll see you later. Okay, I'm coming! Bye bye!

subtitles.original: Mr. Squeaks, come on, we gotta go. We gotta go.
subtitles.english: Mr. Squeaks, come on, we gotta go. We gotta go.

subtitles.original: アンコール！アンコール！
subtitles.english: Encore! Encore!
